statements: SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE checkup = TRUE;
SELECT appointment_id, pet_name FROM Appointments WHERE vaccination = FALSE ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT pet_name, appointment_date FROM Appointments WHERE checkup = FALSE AND vaccination = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT pet_name, appointment_date FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE checkup = TRUE ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT pet_name, appointment_date FROM Appointments WHERE vaccination = TRUE;
SELECT appointment_id, pet_name, appointment_date FROM Appointments WHERE vaccination = TRUE AND appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE checkup = TRUE OR vaccination = TRUE ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT MAX(appointment_date) AS last_appointment_date, COUNT(*) AS total_appointments FROM Appointments;
SELECT * FROM Appointments;
SELECT pet_name, appointment_date FROM Appointments WHERE check_up = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT pet_name, vaccination FROM Appointments WHERE check_up = FALSE;
SELECT appointment_id, pet_name FROM Appointments ORDER BY appointment_id DESC;
SELECT pet_name, appointment_date FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_id = 1
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE vaccination = TRUE
SELECT appointment_id, pet_name FROM Appointments ORDER BY appointment_date DESC
SELECT pet_name, check_up FROM Appointments WHERE vaccination = FALSE ORDER BY appointment_date ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_appointments FROM Appointments
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_id = 1;
SELECT pet_name, appointment_date FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE pet_name LIKE '%Buddy%';
SELECT appointment_id, notes FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_time BETWEEN '09:00' AND '12:00';
SELECT pet_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date = CURRENT_DATE();
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_id = 1;
SELECT pet_name, appointment_date FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_time >= '09:00:00' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;

SELECT pet_name, notes FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT appointment_id, pet_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Appointments ORDER BY appointment_date ASC, appointment_time DESC;

SELECT pet_name, appointment_date FROM Appointments WHERE vaccination_required = TRUE;
SELECT owner_name, contact_number FROM PetOwners ORDER BY owner_name ASC;
SELECT pet_name, pet_species FROM Pets WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT vaccination_name, vaccination_date FROM Vaccinations ORDER BY vaccination_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE vaccination_required = TRUE ORDER BY appointment_date DESC
SELECT owner_name, pet_name FROM PetOwners JOIN Pets ON PetOwners.owner_id = Pets.owner_id WHERE PetOwners.contact_number = '123-456-7890'
SELECT pet_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Appointments WHERE pet_name LIKE 'B%' ORDER BY appointment_time

SELECT owner_name, pet_name, vaccination_name FROM PetOwners JOIN Pets ON PetOwners.owner_id = Pets.owner_id JOIN Vaccinations ON Pets.pet_id = Vaccinations.pet_id WHERE Vaccinations.vaccination_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT owner_name, pet_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Appointments WHERE owner_name = 'John Doe' AND appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM Appointments;
SELECT pet_name, appointment_date FROM Appointments WHERE pet_type = 'Dog';
SELECT veterinarian_name, specialty FROM Veterinarians ORDER BY specialty;
SELECT pet_name, owner_name, owner_contact FROM Pets JOIN Owners ON Pets.owner_name = Owners.owner_name;
SELECT pet_name, vaccination_date FROM Pets JOIN Vaccinations ON Pets.pet_id = Vaccinations.pet_id;
SELECT * FROM Appointments WHERE vaccination_required = true;
SELECT appointment_id, pet_name, appointment_date, veterinarian_name FROM Appointments WHERE appointment_date > NOW();
SELECT pet_name, veterinarian_name, appointment_date FROM Appointments INNER JOIN Veterinarians ON Appointments.veterinarian_name = Veterinarians.veterinarian_name;
SELECT pet_name, appointment_date, vaccination_type FROM Appointments INNER JOIN Vaccinations ON Appointments.pet_name = Vaccinations.pet_name;
SELECT pet_name, owner_name, owner_contact FROM Pets JOIN Owners ON Pets.owner_name = Owners.owner_name;
